member.name: M:MyConsole.MyClass.MyFunction
member.summary: Demo show arrays with data and loops trough the values

member.name: M:MyConsole.MyClass.ArrayWithInt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Demo with an array of integers that we loop and sum. The tell where to start and the tell where to end the summary
member.returns: Sum of values in the array
member.param: Where in the array we will start the sum
Where in the array we will end the sum. default is -1 to the very end

member.name: M:MyConsole.MyClass.ArrayWithDouble(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Demo with an array of double that we loop and sum. The tell where to start and the tell where to end the summary
member.returns: Sum of values in the array
member.param: Where in the array we will start the sum
Where in the array we will end the sum. default is -1 to the very end

member.name: M:MyConsole.MyClass.ArrayWithString(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Demo with an array of strings that we join together The tell where to start and the tell where to end the join
member.returns: Join of strings in the array
member.param: Where in the array we will start the join
Where in the array will we end the join. default is -1 to the very end
